column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Have been here several times in the last few years.  Whether I'm with just one or two other people or in a larger group
column2: I love this place because I feel like it's very reasonably priced
column4: and though the dishes are smallish
column5: they're big enough that everyone generally gets to try them all.  Over the years
column6: we have tried a bunch of different stuff
column7: and we've pretty much figured out which dishes are the must-haves:
